title: Team Performance Survey
description: Help us understand how our team is performing

elements.name: satisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied are you with our team's performance?

elements.name: communication
elements.title: How would you rate our team's communication?

elements.name: teamCollaboration
elements.title: How effective is our team collaboration?

elements.name: workloadBalance
elements.title: Is the workload distributed fairly among team members?

title: Project Feedback
description: Share your thoughts on our recent project

elements.name: projectQuality
elements.title: How would you rate the overall quality of the project?

elements.name: timeline
elements.title: Was the project completed within a reasonable timeline?

elements.name: clientSatisfaction
elements.title: How satisfied do you think the client is with the deliverables?

elements.name: futureDevelopment
elements.title: What would you suggest for future development of this project?
